title: YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4 Waterproof Nylon with Zipper for Men & Women, Black
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4 Waterproof Nylon with Zipper for Men & Women, Black

**Product Description:**

Stay organized and protect your shoes with our YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4! Made from high-quality, waterproof nylon, these bags are perfect for travel, gym, storage, and multi-purpose use. The set includes 4 bags, with 2 standard and 2 X-Large sizes to fit shoes of various sizes.

**Features:**

* Waterproof and lightweight nylon material for durability and ease of use
* Custom-made high-quality zipper with a center design for easy access
* Standard size fits shoes under size 10, while X-Large size fits shoes between size 10 to 14
* Perfect for carrying shoes to and from the gym, keeping shoes dust-free in the closet, or using as a makeup bag or toiletries bag
* Lifetime warranty covers quality issues

**Product Details:**

* Material: Waterproof nylon
* Quantity: 4 bags (2 standard, 2 X-Large)
* Sizes:
	+ Standard: Fits shoes under size 10 (2 bags)
	+ X-Large: Fits shoes between size 10 to 14 (2 bags)
* Zipper: Custom-made, high-quality, center design
* Color: Black
* Warranty: Lifetime, covering quality issues

**Order now and keep your shoes organized and protected with our YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4!**
